feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
